headline: Meta's $2B deal, Santa Claus rally, Buffett's legacy: 3 Things
summary: Meta Platforms (META) announced that it will be acquiring AI startup Manus for over $2 billion. US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) hover just below their flatlines as the Santa Claus rally stumbles. Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-A, BRK-B) CEO Warren Buffett prepares to hand the reins over to Greg Abel at the year's end. Buffett will stay on as chairman of Berkshire's board. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-A, BRK-B) CEO Warren Buffett prepares to hand the reins over to Greg Abel at the year's end. Buffett will stay on as chairman of Berkshire's board.

headline: 3 ETFs Warren Buffett Is Quietly Keeping in His Secret Portfolio
summary: The name Warren Buffett has become interchangeable with Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK-B). But in a separate portfolio, he holds ETFs like the iShares Core MSCI EA (BATS:IEFA), Vanguard High Dividend Yield Index Fund ETF (NYSEARCA:VYM), and iShares Core MSCI International Developed Markets ETF (NYSEARCA:IDEV) in his portfolio. Buffett is expected to retire soon and pass on ... 3 ETFs Warren Buffett Is Quietly Keeping in His Secret Portfolio

headline: The Buffett Indicator, inflation, and Warren Buffett's leadership
summary: After 60 years at the top of one of the world's biggest investment firms, Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-A, BRK-B) CEO Warren Buffett will be handing off the leadership reins to Greg Abel at the end of 2025. The Oracle of Omaha was also noted to have invented the Buffett Indicator, which assesses the valuation of the stock market by dividing the total value of US stocks with the total US GDP (gross domestic product). Miramar Capital Co-Founder & Senior Portfolio Manager Max Wasserman and Yahoo Finance senior reporter Ines Ferré look back on Warren Buffett's legacy, the status of the Buffett Indicator, and how Berkshire Hathaway's portfolio came to include major AI players. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Live Q&A Today: Warren Buffett’s Legacy
summary: Legendary investor Warren Buffett will step down at year’s end as chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway. Wall Street Journal readers, we want to hear from you. What do you think will be Buffett’s greatest legacy? Join a live written chat with our reporters from 1 p.

headline: Is This Warren Buffett’s Final Warning About the S&P 500?
summary: Tomorrow marks Warren Buffett’s final day as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK-A)(NYSE:BRK-B), ending a tenure spanning six decades that turned a struggling textile company into a $1 trillion conglomerate. At age 95, Buffett will step down, with Greg Abel taking over as CEO on Jan. 1, while Buffett remains chairman. As he exits daily investment ... Is This Warren Buffett’s Final Warning About the S&P 500?

headline: What the Buffett Indicator says about the bull market, AI trade
summary: After 60 years at the top of one of the world's biggest investment firms, Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-A, BRK-B) CEO Warren Buffett will be handing off the leadership reins to Greg Abel at the end of 2025. The Oracle of Omaha was also noted to have invented the Buffett Indicator, which assesses the valuation of the stock market by dividing the total value of US stocks with the total US GDP (gross domestic product). Yahoo Finance senior reporter Brooke DiPalma weighs in on how much longer the Buffett Indicator may be calling for a continued bull market, while Miramar Capital Co-Founder and senior portfolio manager Max Wasserman comments on his outlook on the AI trade when factoring in Warren Buffett's market formula. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Warren Buffett Is About to Retire. Should You Dump Your Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B) Stock?
summary: He’s the Oracle of Omaha and, quite possibly, the greatest living investor. Warren Buffett, the CEO of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK-B), has rewarded Berkshire’s loyal shareholders with outstanding returns based on his value-focused stock portfolio. However, at age 95, Buffett surely knows that he can’t stay at the helm of Berkshire Hathaway forever. Thus, Buffett is about ... Warren Buffett Is About to Retire. Should You Dump Your Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B) Stock?
